tidbits.title: Strategic Military Base
tidbits.description: The British Indian Ocean Territory houses a strategic military base, Diego Garcia, leased to the United Kingdom by the United States, playing a significant role in global geopolitics.

tidbits.title: Ecological Preservation
tidbits.description: Despite its restricted access, the territory is home to diverse marine life and ecosystems, with efforts in place to protect its natural environment and biodiversity.

tidbits.title: Controversial History
tidbits.description: The establishment of the military base led to the forced displacement of indigenous Chagossians, resulting in a long-standing legal and humanitarian controversy.
